text: T Microscopii is a semiregular variable star in the constellation Microscopium. It ranges from magnitude 6.74 to 8.11 over a period of 352 days. Located around 700 light-years distant, it shines with a bolometric luminosity 7,509 times that of the Sun and has a surface temperature of . ==References== Category:Microscopium Microscopii, T Category:Semiregular variable stars Category:M-type giants 100935 194676 Category:Durchmusterung objects Category:Emission-line stars
title: T Microscopii
